page.title: 07Village Organisations
page.content:
Folksworth is a small village but it has many organizations.There are eleven altogether.They are the Parish Council,Village Hall Committee,Under Fives,Brownies,Cubs,Youth Club,Womens Institute,Evergreens,Folksworth Cricket Club,St.Helens Church Group and Folksworth School P.T.A.
VILLAGE HALL The Village Hall was built in 1952. It is built of clay bricks.It is a pound an hour plus electricity to hire.The people who use it are the Under Fives,Cubs,Evergreens,Womens Institute and Youth Club.The hall is mostly used in the mornings by the Under Fives and by the various groups in the evenings.
